title: Strengthening Teaching Practice Competencies: Developing Language Learning Materials for Character Education Based on Hypercontent

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply five core character values (collaboration, honesty, responsibility, respect, creativity) to real-life language situations through hypercontent.
Learners can perform character-related problem-solving scenarios with over 85% accuracy using digital content.
Learners can achieve a 30% or greater improvement in character education learning outcomes through pre- and post-assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
